name: sendReminder(to:localizableMessageKey:arguments:completionHandler:)
desc: Sends a reminder from one participant to a specific set of other participants.
declaration:
func sendReminder(to participants: [GKTurnBasedParticipant], 
localizableMessageKey key: String, 
        arguments: [String], 
completionHandler: ((Error?) -> Void)? = nil)
